Detailed Description

BIP Server Service (imaging responder).

This class provides all functionality to act as an imaging responder for BIP. Currently the scenarios of Image Push and Image Pull are supported. Pls. see also the Bluetooth specification for the Basic Imaging Profile. An application acting as BIP server is informed about incoming events by BtBipServerNotificationMsg. The message contains a BtBipServerNotificationMsgArg that denotes what type of request is made by the remote device. The application then has to send the response using this class.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN BtBipServerService::AbortRsp (  BtObexResponseCode  obex_result  ) 
 

Answer incoming abort request.

If the remote device wants to abort an operation, a BtBipServerNotificationMsg with a BtBipAbortIndArg is sent to the application. The application has to discard all data, that has been received so far and send an abort response.

BOOLEAN BtBipServerService::Cancel (  BtObexResponseCode  obex_result  ) 
 

Cancel ongoing put or get operation.

With this method the following operations can be canceled:

  • Put Image
  • Put Linked Thumbnail
  • Put Linked Attachment
  • Get Image List
  • Get Image Properties
  • Get Image
  • Get Linked Thumbnail
  • Get Linked Attachment

BOOLEAN BtBipServerService::ConnectRsp (  BtObexResponseCode  obex_result  ) 
 

Answer incoming connect request.

The connection to the remote device is established or a reason, why a connection is currently not possible, can be sent.

BOOLEAN BtBipServerService::DeleteImageRsp (  BtObexResponseCode  obex_result  ) 
 

Send response to incoming delete image request.

This method has to be called by the application as response to a Delete indication to inform the remote device, that the image has been deleted.

BOOLEAN BtBipServerService::ErrorRsp (  BtRequestState  rc  ) 
 

Send an error response to any incoming request.

This method can be called by the application to send an error as response to any incoming request.

Parameters:
rc 

BOOLEAN BtBipServerService::GetImagePropertiesRsp (  BtObexResponseCode  obex_result,
const BtBipImagePropertiesPtr &  img_props
) 
 

Send response to incoming get image properties request.

This method has to be called by the application as response to a Get Image Properties indication to send the properties of the requested image to the remote device.

Parameters:
img_props Properties of image given in the incoming Get Image Properties request

BOOLEAN BtBipServerService::GetImageRsp (  BtObexResponseCode  obex_result,
UINT32  file_length,
const DataSourcePtr &  img
) 
 

Send response to incoming get image request.

This method has to be called by the application as response to a Get Image indication to send the requested image to the remote device.

Parameters:
file_length Length of image data in bytes.
img Shared pointer to data source, where the binary image data can be read from.

BOOLEAN BtBipServerService::GetImagesListRsp (  BtObexResponseCode  obex_result,
const BtBipImageListPtr &  image_list,
const BtBipImageHdlDescPtr &  applied_filter
) 
 

Send response to incoming get images list request.

This method has to be called by the application as response to a Get Images List indication to send the list of images on the local device to the remote device.

Parameters:
image_list List of images on the local device, setup according to constraints in the incoming Get Images List request.
applied_filter Filter, that was applied to build the image list.

BOOLEAN BtBipServerService::GetImagingCapabilitiesRsp (  BtObexResponseCode  obex_result,
const BtBipImagingCapabilitiesPtr &  img_cap
) 
 

Send response to incoming get imaging capabilities request.

This method has to be called by the application as response to a Get Imaging Capabilities indication to send the capabilities of the local device to the remote device.

Parameters:
obex_result Obex result of the request (usually Success)
img_cap Imaging capabilities.

) 
 

Send response to incming get linked attachment request.

This method has to be called by the application as response to a Get Linked Thumbnail indication to send the requested attachment to the remote device.

Parameters:
attachment Shared pointer to data source, where the binary attachment data can be read from.

UINT32 BtBipServerService::GetProgressInBytes (   ) 
 

Get the Bytes already transfered in the current request.

If no Get or PUT request is running 0 Bytes are returned

virtual BtRequestState BtBipServerService::GetRequestState (  BtRequestType  request_type  )  const [inline, virtual]
 

Get request state.

This server service doesn't use requests, so the returned state will always be BtRqsUnknown

) 
 

Send response to incoming put image request.

This method has to be called by the application as response to an Put Image indication to receive the incoming image.

Parameters:
handle Handle to image that is created on the local device by the put image request
image DataSink where image data can be written to.

Parameters:
attach DataSink where attachment data can be written to by APOXI BT BIP
